---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(readr)
```

```{r}
outcomes<-readr::read_csv("outcome_data.csv")
predictions<-readr::read_csv("prediction_data.csv")
group<-readr::read_csv("group_assignments.csv")
colnames(group)<-c("group_i","group_name")
```

```{r}
data<-cbind(group,outcomes,predictions)
data$...1<-NULL

```

```{r}
summary(lm(d_bf~EDM*group_name+BSCS*group_name,data))
```

```{r}
summary(lm(d_bf~EDM  + BSCS + group_name + `EDM*ni`+`EDM*san`+ `BSCS*ni`+`BSCS*san`,data))
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)

data %>% group_by(group_name) %>% summarise(mean_change=mean(d_bf,na.rm=TRUE))
```
```{r}
hist(data$d_bf)
```
